name: hello plant.
description:
I wanted to learn how to make a game, so I did! °˖✧◝(｡´• ω •`｡)◜✧˖° 
A super short game where you take care of your very own plant.

2 unique endings for a whopping 15 seconds of gameplay!!! How cool!!!

Development, music, and art by lylychii. Thanks to Belinda Zhang and Raquel Lopes for the initial concept and brainstorming!
